Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Coyotes told their fans to stop doing the wave Andrew Joseph 3:07 p.m. ET Feb. 21, 2017 
Arizona Coyotes left wing Christian Dvorak (18) celebrates with teammates after scoring a goal in the first period against the Anaheim Ducks at Gila River Arena. (Photo: Matt Kartozian-USA TODAY Sports) 
The Arizona Coyotes have long been near the bottom of the NHL in attendance. They have one of the worst records in the league and have been in a seemingly never-ending battle with Glendale over their arena. With all that in mind, the Coyotes don't really have any room to criticize the few fans that show up to Gila River Arena â€¦ with one exception: 
The wave. 
The wave is the worst. And when fans during the Coyotes' game against the Ducks on Monday tried to start the wave, the Coyotes' Twitter account took a stand. Attention fans in 112: We don't do the wave here.
